title: [Temperature Check] - Enable $IDLE liquidity mining on IdleFEI
body:
### Summary
This Temperature Check gauges the community sentiment on the [proposal to activate $IDLE liquidity mining on IdleFEI](https://gov.idle.finance/t/enable-idle-liquidity-mining-on-idlefei/696) on idleFEI Best-Yield pool.

If the proposal will pass the Temperature Check, it will be merged with the next IIP. 

### Motivation
Idle DAO initiated the journey to make the relationship with the vibrant Fei community stronger, representing a secure and fruitful place for FEI holders and Fei DAO itself.

With the Integration Standard Requirements already complied, 1 month in beta phase, and the pool’s TVL ($3m) that makes the rebalance cost sustainable, [IdleFEI Best-Yield landed in production](https://idlefinance.medium.com/idle-fei-expanding-yield-optimization-across-capital-efficient-stablecoins-cf6011fd3056).

As a next step, we would like to introduce the idea of enabling $IDLE farming for the FEI pool. If Governance will approve this proposal, the idleFEI pool will then be included in the $IDLE liquidity mining program and will dynamically receive $IDLE depending on TVL and APY of the pool.

$IDLE liquidity mining would allow Idle to attract a wide potential target market ($500m circulating supply). At the same time, the extension of $IDLE governance ownership to FEI LPs would represent a way to incentivize participation in the upcoming idleFEI tranches, built on top of the Best-Yield strategy.

The Fei community will then have access to the “neutral” Best-Yield, “protected” Senior Tranche, and “leveraged” Junior Tranche, expanding the suite of yield optimization products.

The collaboration with Fei DAO could further incentivize liquidity provision thanks to [TRIBE Liquidity Mining](https://tribe.fei.money/t/tribe-liquidity-mining-emission-schedule/3549) distributed via Tribal Chief Programs. Lastly, Fei DAO could also consider Idle as a yield source for its [$1b PCV allocation](https://app.fei.money/analytics), which is mainly deposited in Aave and Compound. 


### Details
The technical implementation will be developed by Dev League.

Actions:
* idleFEI liquidity mining activation: 2 actions

### Voting Options
Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
**FOR**: Approve $IDLE liquidity mining activation on IdleFEI
**AGAINST**: Vote against $IDLE liquidity mining activation on IdleFEI
**DISCUSS MORE**: Discuss more the proposal

This poll is available for both [$IDLE token holders](https://snapshot.org/#/idlefinance.eth) and [stkIDLE holders](https://snapshot.org/#/staking.idlefinance.eth).
The final $IDLE voting weights will be calculated using the [approved calculator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BnH9boRmBADuyquvDMh0AmQfF97Zj76sIENKtySLU8o/edit?usp=sharing).
author: 0x2fa92128ecE3901395448bf62Dd5Ff6a35871540
